events.title: Sara Kays
events.location: Tuscaloosa, Alabama, United States Of America
events.description: BOX OFFICE SALES AND VENUE DOORS OPEN ONE HOUR PRIOR TO TICKET TIME. NO WILL CALL. AGES 17 AND UNDER MUST BE WITH PARENT/GAURDIAN OR 18+ TO ENTER. TICKET HOLDERS MUST HAVE VALID PHOTO ID. BOX OFFICE IS CREDIT CARD ONLY.
